Description: Teleport to Location. You can find a list of all the Locations in the game lower in the guide
Instant level up
Move to the current selected quest’s objective
Fly through walls and become invicible (like a ghost)
While the console is open, press on a character and use this cheat to kill them
Unlock all spells
Kill everyone around
Activates Overpowered God Mode (invincibility, money, max skills and stats)
Get Skeleton Key which unlocks any door
Add money. In this case 1 million
Add a new item to your inventory. ChangeItemIDwith an actual ID and the Amount with a number to get that item in your inventory
Learn a new spell. ChangeSpellIDwith the spell’s ID you want to learn
Set the skill to the desired amount. Write the skill names exactly the same as they appear in the menus, two word skills are written in one word
Set the attribute (strength, intelligence, willpower, agility, speed, endurance, personality, or luck) to the desired amount
Increase carry weight
Change Birthsign
Change class (resets skills)
Enchant equipment
Change appearance
Create Spells
Immediately end the Tutorial Quest. You’ll still have to teleport out of the prison
Activates (or deactivates) the AI
Activates (or deactivates) the AI’s ability to fight
Activates (or deactivates) the AI’s ability to detect you
Activates God Mode (invincibility)
Unlock all Map Markers (tmm 0 hides all markers)
Toggle debug photo mode
While the console is open, press on a door and use this cheat to unlock it
Reverse the Ghost cheat
